The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 October is 687,327 (1,221.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 October, there were 99,354 new confirmed cases (176.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 October, there were 91,678 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% ( 7,676 extra cases).
